mng: to resist, to repel, to refuse

exm.mng: to refuse, to decline, to reject
to resist, to defy, to oppose
to tactfully decline, to turn down gracefully
to refuse to take a passenger (of taxi)
act of God, force majeure (law), irresistible (idiom)
to lock one's door and refuse to see sb
to meet with a refusal (e.g. visa), to have an application rejected
to reject, to refuse to accept
to refuse to accept a payment, to refuse to pay, to stop (a cheque or payment)
